name: Ptekwe
languages: Druidic (can read and write but not speak)

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Ptekwe is a Circle of Spores Druid, granting her access to the following spells.

trait.name: Sleepless
entries: Kreen do not require sleep to survive and thus do not attain {@condition exhaustion} levels by staying awake for extended periods. This also grants an immunity to charms that cause sleep.

trait.name: Monstrosity
entries: Spells and other effects that target humanoids have no effect on kreen.

trait.name: Secondary Arms
entries: As with other kreen, Ptekwe has 2 minor arms just under her major pair, which can be used to manipulate small objects, wield weapons with the light property, and lift up to 10 pounds each.

action.name: Bog Staff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 1d8 + 13}) bludgeoning damage, or 19 ({@damage 1d12 + 13}) bludgeoning damage if used with both hands.

action.name: Spellcasting
entries: Ptekwe casts 1 spell through her Bog Staff.

action.name: Dread Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 1d12 + 15}) slashing damage, plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Dread Spell
entries: Ptekwe casts 1 spell at 3rd level using her Dread Scimitar as a focus. This does not expend any spell slots. 1/short rest

action.name: Wild Shape
entries: Ptekwe magically transforms into one of the following creatures:
Rat, Reef Shark, Poisonous Snake, Crocodile, Giant Frog, Deinonychus, Spider, Owlbear, Crab, Constrictor Snake, Frog
This action may only be used 3 times per long rest.

While transformed, Ptekwe's stats are changed to match that of the creature, except for proficiencies, int, wis, and cha. She is forced to revert upon reaching 0 HP and remaining damage is carried over into her true form's HP.

action.name: Symbiotic Entity
entries: Ptekwe expends 1 use of her Wild Shape feature to imbue her body with the essence of decay. +1 dice roll to Halo of Spores reaction damage. Ptekwe gains 28 temporary hit points. All melee attacks deal an extra {@damage 1d6} necrotic damage. These effects end after 1 hour passes or Ptekwe loses all temporary hit points.

action.name: Chameleon Carapace
entries: If Ptekwe is wearing no armor, she shifts the colors and texture of her exoskeleton, giving her advantage on Stealth (Dexterity) checks.

bonus.name: Dual Wielding
entries: If Ptekwe makes an attack (success or failure) with one of her melee weapons, she may use her bonus action to strike again with the other.

bonus.name: Chaotic Resonance
entries: Elemental energy courses through Ptekwe's body, allowing her to add {@damage 2d6} elemental damage of any type to her next melee attack. This effect does not stack, and costs 1 use of Wild Shape.

reaction.name: Halo of Spores
entries: If an enemy moves within a 10ft radius of Ptekwe or starts its turn there, she may send necrotic spores hurtling towards them. The target creature must make a {@dc 17}+ constitution saving throw or take {@damage 1d6} necrotic damage ({@dice 2d6} when Symbiotic Entity is active).

reaction.name: Fungal Infestation
entries: If a small or medium humanoid or beast dies within 10ft of Ptekwe, she can choose to reanimate it. The risen creature has 1 hp, uses the Zombie stat block, and obeys Ptekwe's mental commands. The zombie's turn comes directly after Ptekwe's and can only take melee attack actions. The Zombie dies if it is reduced to 0 HP or if 1 hour passes since it has risen.

reaction.name: Bad Omen
entries: Ptekwe spaces out and mumbles about future destruction. 1 hostile creature of Ptekwe's choice within 20ft of her must make a {@dc 17}+ wisdom saving throw or gain disadvantage on its next attack roll.
